longdes:
As the world is coming to terms with this new way of life, we communities are also adopting new formats and methods to bring you all Indiaâ€™s biggest developers conference DevFest India 2020 online with talks, activities, fun & much more.

From beginners to experts, coders to creatives, DevFest India 2020 conference is for everyone, so come along, share your knowledge and learn something new.
